Package org.yesworkflow.extract

Class KeywordMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yesworkflow.extract.KeywordMatcher

  • public class KeywordMatcher
extends Object
    Simple class for searching a list of comment lines for those containing YW keywords. Optionally trims from each line characters preceding the first YW keyword.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  KeywordMatcher.MatchExtent

      KeywordMatcher​(Collection<String> keywords)

    • Method Detail

      • matchesKeyword

        public KeywordMatcher.MatchExtent matchesKeyword​(String s)

      • match

        public String match​(String line,
                    boolean trim)
        Searches a comment line for YW keywords. Returns the line if a keyword is found and null otherwise. Trims characters preceding the first keyword in the return value if requested.
        Parameters:
        line - The comment line to search for YW keywords.
        trim - Characters preceding first keyword are trimmed in the return value if true.
        Returns:
        The (optionally trimmed) comment line if it contains a YW keyword, or null otherwise.

      • findKeyword

        public int findKeyword​(String line)
        Finds the first occurrence of a YW keyword in a comment line. Returns the index of the start of the keyword or -1 if no keyword is found.

        TODO: If the performance of this method proves unsatisfactory, replace it with an implementation that uses a trie (prefix tree) to represent the set of keywords.

        Parameters:
        line - The comment line to search for YW keywords.
        Returns:
        The start index of the first keyword found, or -1 if no keyword is found.

        public static YWKeywords.Tag extractInitialKeyword​(String s,
                                                   YWKeywords keywords)
